data.title: Find & Book SBB Train Tickets
data.meta_description: Travel by train from Zurich Hb to Zermatt in 3h 12m. Get train times, compare prices & buy cheap train tickets ✅ for Zurich Hb to Zermatt today.
data.text:
The average train time from Zurich Hb station to Zermatt station is 4h 3m, although it takes 3h 12m on the fastest SBB services. There are around 25 trains per day running from Zurich to Zermatt and will usually require a change along the way in Visp. You can find more information in our guide to getting to Zermatt from Zurich.

All trains depart from Zurich Hb station.

All trains arrive into Zermatt station.

Separated by 162km of incredible views, the train from Zermatt to Zurich is the best way to get from one side of the country to the other. Not just because of the scenery, but because SBB trains are comfortable, quick and take you right into the heart of Zermatt without having to find somewhere to park. You'll be ready to hit the slopes in no time! Why not check out our guide to the best European ski resorts reachable by train to whet your appetite while you travel, or take a look at the best things to do in Zermatt?

Ready to book? Start a search for tickets in our Journey Planner at the top of the page or keep scrolling for train times, tips on how to find cheap tickets and FAQs about the trip from Zurich to Zermatt by train.
